content: स्वयम् {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} {@--1@} Oneself, in one's own person (used reflexively and applicable to all persons, such as myself, ourselves, thyself, himself &c. &c., and sometimes used with other pronouns for the sake of emphasis); विषवृक्षोपि संवर्ध्य स्वयं छेत्तुमसांप्रतं <ls>Ku. 2. 55</ls>; यस्य नास्ति स्वयं प्रज्ञा शास्त्रं तस्य करोति किं <ls>Subhāṣ.</ls>; <ls>R. 1. 70</ls>; <ls n="R.">3. 20</ls>, <ls n="R.">2. 56</ls>; <ls>Ms. 5. 39.</ls> {@--2@} Spontaneously, of one's own accord, without trouble or exertion; स्वयमेवोत्पद्यंत एवंविधाः कुलपांशवो निःस्नेहाः पशवः <ls>K.</ls>
